meanings.definition: Extremely thin and bony in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The gauntest cat in the neighborhood always looked hungry.
meanings.sent2: She was the gauntest of all the models at the fashion show.
meanings.sent3: The gauntest scarecrow in the field seemed to be on a perpetual diet.
meanings.sent4: His gauntest smile revealed his inner struggles.
meanings.sent5: The gauntest tree in the forest stood out against the lush greenery.

meanings.sent1: The gauntest landscape was devoid of any signs of life.
meanings.sent2: After the fire, only the gauntest trees remained standing.
meanings.sent3: The gauntest room in the house was always the coldest.
meanings.sent4: Her gauntest thoughts echoed in the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The gauntest desert stretched out endlessly under the scorching sun.
